mapper.select: select r.no,a.no as accountNo,r.cost,br.created_at,br.created_name,rule.name from f_finance_bill_record br,f_account a ,f_finance_record r,f_account_cost_item i,f_cost_rule rule where br.finance_record_id = r.id and r.account_id=a.id and a.id=i.account_id and i.rule_id = rule.id and a.id=${map.accountId}
